languages.text: "Император помилуй, какие мутанты? Мы — лишь горстка пустотников, безобидных торговцев. Настоятельно прошу покинуть орбиту станции, или мы будем вынуждены обороняться!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
languages.original_text: "Император помилуй, какие мутанты? Мы — лишь горстка пустотников, безобидных торговцев. Настоятельно прошу покинуть орбиту станции, или мы будем вынуждены обороняться!"

traits.locale_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
"Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

languages.text: "Der Imperator stehe uns bei, welche Mutanten? Wir sind Raumfahrer, ein Kollektiv harmloser Händler. Ich bitte Euch, den Orbit der Station zu verlassen, da wir uns andernfalls verteidigen müssten."
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator stehe uns bei, welche Mutanten? Wir sind Raumfahrer, ein Kollektiv harmloser Händler. Ich bitte Euch, den Orbit der Station zu verlassen, da wir uns andernfalls verteidigen müssten."

languages.text: « L'Empereur ait pitié de nous, quels mutants ? Nous ne sommes qu'un petit groupe de cosmomarins et de négociants inoffensifs. Je vous prie instamment de quitter l'orbite de la station, sans quoi nous serons obligés de nous défendre ! »
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur ait pitié de nous, quels mutants ? Nous ne sommes qu'un petit groupe de cosmomarins et de négociants inoffensifs. Je vous prie instamment de quitter l'orbite de la station, sans quoi nous serons obligés de nous défendre ! »

languages.text: «¡Por la gracia del Emperador! ¿Qué mutantes? No somos más que un montón de habitantes del vacío, un colectivo de comerciantes inofensivos. ¡Le insto a que abandone la órbita de la estación o nos veremos obligados a defendernos!».
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por la gracia del Emperador! ¿Qué mutantes? No somos más que un montón de habitantes del vacío, un colectivo de comerciantes inofensivos. ¡Le insto a que abandone la órbita de la estación o nos veremos obligados a defendernos!».

languages.text: 「皇帝は慈悲深いが、変異体だと？俺たちは、ただのヴォイズマン、無害な貿易商の集団に過ぎない。さっさとステーション軌道から退去するんだ。さもなきゃ自己防衛する羽目になるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は慈悲深いが、変異体だと？俺たちは、ただのヴォイズマン、無害な貿易商の集団に過ぎない。さっさとステーション軌道から退去するんだ。さもなきゃ自己防衛する羽目になるぞ！」

languages.text: “帝皇保佑！哪来的变种人？我们不过是一群旅行者，一群人畜无害的商人而已。我敦促您赶紧离开这座星站的轨道，否则我们将不得不进行反击！”
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇保佑！哪来的变种人？我们不过是一群旅行者，一群人畜无害的商人而已。我敦促您赶紧离开这座星站的轨道，否则我们将不得不进行反击！”

languages.text: "İmparator merhamet et, mutant da nereden çıktı? Bir avuç uçsuz eri toplandık, kimseye zararımız olmadan tacirlikle uğraşıyoruz. İstasyon yörüngesinden ayrılmanızda ısrar ediyorum. Aksi hâlde kendimizi savunmak zorunda kalırız!"
languages.original_text: "Emperor have mercy, what mutants? We are but a bunch of voidsmen, a collective of harmless traders. I urge you to leave station orbit or we will be forced to defend ourselves!"
